thread.title: Hydrogen OS 3.0 (based on Nougat) has been Released for the OnePlus 3/3T
thread.title_full: Hydrogen OS 3.0 (based on Nougat) has been Released for the OnePlus 3/3T

author: Mishaal Rahman
title: Hydrogen OS 3.0 (based on Nougat) has been Released for the OnePlus 3/3T
text: Hydrogen OS version 3.0 has officially been released by OnePlus for their Chinese customers, but it can be side-loaded onto any OnePlus 3/3T device. The massive update brings with it Android Nougat and a whole host of other changes. Check out the linked thread for installation instructions, screenshots, and an ongoing discussion as users discuss whatâ€™s new.
